messages.subject: Re:Weather
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/5/2004 6:50:48 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: **I guess we ll be staying in today and watching
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/5/2004 6:50:48 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
**I guess we'll be staying in today and watching movies and I don't want
to hear any more about your damn AC Mary! <g>**
Ah, yeah, same here, -20 in Minnesota, but a high of -5 I hear! <g>

All of you down south, if you listen really close I bet you can hear all
the raspberries!

Kelli in MN
*************************
Oh, you poor girl! Our minister came here to MA from MN for the balmy
weather! We're a full 45 degrees higher than you right now.

Kathryn, appreciating the difference between cold and %^&!$# ! cold


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Weather
messages.msgSnippet: We are in the 50 s today ... kids are in shorts. High tomorrow is 48 ... Monday 33 ... Tuesday 23.  At least it is dropping slowly! Barbara Barbara Moreda
messages.messageBody:
We are in the 50's today ... kids are in shorts. High tomorrow is 48 ...
Monday 33 ... Tuesday 23. At least it is dropping slowly!

Barbara

Barbara Moreda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weather
messages.msgSnippet: We had a dosy of a storm yesterday :) I love storms but my sis was running around like chicken little :) Tornado horn went off in town, of course I didnt even
messages.messageBody:
We had a dosy of a storm yesterday :) I love storms but my sis was running
around like chicken little :) Tornado horn went off in town, of course I
didnt even hear it, Mike said it (tornado) was 5 miles from us, I on the
other hand was standing on porch watching the wonderful events :) hee-hee my
mom was freakin! Woke up to wind advisories and 40 degree temps. Heard
someone say in grocery that snow is expected sometime this week, guess I
better find out and drag out the woolies :)
Indiana Tami

"You must be the change you wish to see in the world"
~Ghandi
Networking for Central Indiana unschoolers :)
http://communities.msn.com/ChildLedLearninginIndiana
Children Leading the Way!
http://ChildLedLearning-subscribe@yahoogroups.com
http://ChildEarthBasedLearning-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

From: Bridget E Coffman <rumpleteasermom@...>
Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weather
Date: Thu, 25 Oct 2001 08:52:33 -0400


> Date: Wed, 24 Oct 2001 14:29:56 EDT
> From: Unschoolingmommy@...
> Subject: Re: snow in North Dakota
>
> It's over 70 degrees in Cleveland!
>
>

Not any more! A drop of 40 degrees in 24 hours is just nasty! I hope we
don't gett he snow too.

Bridget
